title: How should I write raps like modern trap rappers? Lyrics, not beats, and serious answers only. - Quora

response.answer_text: Once you get a trap beat then you can follow these three easy steps to make your trap song. The content does not necessarily have to be money, cash, hoes. You can pick any content and make a trap song from it. Learn the Triplets This is the biggest component of any Trap song. What are Triplets? Basically all classical rap lyrics go like this. …………………………..rhyme………………………………………………rhyme snare …………………..snare …………………..snare …………………..snare The Triplet flow goes like this. ……………rhyme………………… rhyme……………………rhyme…..(yeah!) snare …………………..snare …………………..snare …………………..snare Ad-libs Once you write your lyrics with Triplets and flow you will notice a lot of empty spaces i.e the gap in your flow. You should fill it up with ad-libs that hype your song up. These sound especially good on a Trap Beat. Hook This is the part that will make or break a Trap song. Finding the right melody for the hook part of the song is extremely important. Try to hum a melody while the beat plays and keep fitting words and phrases to your melody. Finding the right melody does need a good ear and some talent however the beat will usually carry you if you come up with a half-decent melody. There you go. Drop a link in the comments if you get around to recording and putting your song on Youtube. Good luck.
